tasks.instruction:
Redesign the LegalLetter AI app with a consistent light blue gradient theme. Implement:
1. Light blue gradient color scheme throughout the app
2. Shiny effects on all buttons with hover animations
3. Subtle animations to make content pop
4. Use light blue gradient as the primary accent color
5. Update all components to follow the new design system
6. Ensure consistency across all pages (Auth, Dashboard, Admin, etc.)
7. Add smooth transitions and micro-interactions

Implement and verify the dummy checkout system with coupon/affiliate functionality. Ensure:
1. Dummy checkout process works properly with payment simulation
2. Coupon system validates employee codes and applies 20% discount
3. Affiliate system tracks referrals and calculates 5% commission for employees
4. Letter generation is restricted to User role only (remove from Employee dashboard)
5. Subscription plans are only accessible in User area
6. Test all checkout flows and affiliate tracking
7. Fix any issues with the coupon validation and commission calculation
